'''1.17.41''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released for most platforms on October 27, 2021, and released for Fire tablets on October 29, 2021, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4411858037005|title=Minecraft - 1.17.41 (Bedrock)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=October 27, 2021}}</ref> This version is still compatible with all Bedrock platforms running on [[Bedrock Edition 1.17.40|1.17.40]].

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash that could occur when starting a split screen session while playing on PlayStation
* Fixed a problem that caused certain worlds to drastically increase in size, causing high memory usage ({{bug|MCPE-143156}})
